comment.brief: Only the alpha channel of the image will be considered.
comment.full: Only the alpha channel of the image will be considered.

comment.brief: The image is assumed to be grayscale and only the *red* channel will be considered.
comment.full: The image is assumed to be grayscale and only the *red* channel will be considered.

comment.brief: Each channel will be masked separately, all channels including alpha will be considered.
comment.full: Each channel will be masked separately, all channels including alpha will be considered.

comment.brief: Specifies which channels should be used to determine the opacity of each pixel.
comment.full: Specifies which channels should be used to determine the opacity of each pixel.
